review.reviewBody: Food was good, large portion on the pastas.  Only complaint is the salad arrived with dressing on which made it a little soggy
this is the absolute worst calamari i ever had from the Calamari Meal . so dry and rubbery. inedible.

great food, super reliable. we order here all the time and look forward to it at least a couple times a month.  lasagnas and the seafood tortellini are some of our favs.  A true staple if you are in the Surrey area.
Ordered lasagna and pizza. Everything tasted amazing! Will definitely order again
It's always good out here, if you want to take out, pickup or even dine inside. If you got munchies they got 3 diff varities of cuisines THEY know wassup
